articles.title: Kendrick Bourne reportedly agrees to one-year contract with 49ers
articles.description:
Bourne was cut by the Patriots prior to the start of the season.

The post Kendrick Bourne reportedly agrees to one-year contract with 49ers appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kendrick Bourne signs a one-year contract with the San Francisco 49ers.
Bourne was released by the New England Patriots before the season started.
This move affects local fans as Bourne transitions from the Patriots to the 49ers.

articles.title: The Ocean Club restaurant opens in Martha’s Vineyard landmark bank building
articles.description:
Award-winning chef Marc Orfaly leads The Ocean Club, a new fine dining restaurant in the historic Martha’s Vineyard landmark bank building.

The post The Ocean Club restaurant opens in Martha’s Vineyard landmark bank building appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: The Ocean Club restaurant opens in a historic bank building in Martha’s Vineyard.
Award-winning chef Marc Orfaly leads the new fine dining establishment.
Local residents can enjoy upscale dining options in a landmark location.

articles.title: Saving pamphlets, receipts, and wrappers: Young people take on junk journaling
articles.description:
“We’re really hoping for a return to this, like, tangible, analog practice where you are using your hands again.”

The post Saving pamphlets, receipts, and wrappers: Young people take on junk journaling appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Young Bostonians embrace junk journaling to revive analog creativity and personal expression.
Workshops on junk journaling are being organized in local community centers this fall.
Participants report improved mental well-being and connection to their surroundings through this practice.

articles.title: Review & setlist: My Chemical Romance skewers fascism at Fenway Park
articles.description:
With their "Long Live The Black Parade" tour, My Chemical Romance delivered an elaborate and entertaining exploration of authoritarianism.

The post Review & setlist: My Chemical Romance skewers fascism at Fenway Park appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: My Chemical Romance performed at Fenway Park on September 8, 2025.
The concert featured themes of authoritarianism, resonating with local audiences.
Boston residents experienced a unique cultural commentary through music and performance.

articles.title: After serial shoplifters swipe $18K in sunglasses at Faneuil Hall, police issue request for tips
articles.description:
Shoplifting concerns persist in Boston after a big upswing last year, but reasons remain murky.

The post After serial shoplifters swipe $18K in sunglasses at Faneuil Hall, police issue request for tips appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Police report $18,000 in sunglasses stolen by serial shoplifters at Faneuil Hall.
Shoplifting incidents in Boston increased significantly last year, raising community concerns.
Authorities are seeking public tips to combat rising thefts affecting local businesses.
